alert.note: Alert for Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 13 at 8:04PM CDT until June 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL KEARNY COUNTY... At 804 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Lakin. Between 2 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lakin. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
